casebody.data:
STATE
v.
James Phillip MEGGS. No. 721P05. Supreme Court of North Carolina. January 26, 2006. William P. Hart, Special Deputy Attorney General, Michael Parker, District Attorney, for State.

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 30th day of December 2005 by Defendant for Petition for Plain Error Review:

"Motion Dismissed by order of the Court in conference this the 26th day of January 2006."
